overview:
Roger Richter can help you protect the life that you and your family have worked so hard to build with top-quality insurance and financial products backed by State Farm.

Roger Richter is your local State Farm agent in Freeland, MI. He provides a wide array of insurance and financial products for residents of Freeland, Auburn, Midland, Bay City, Saginaw, and the rest of the Great Lakes Bay region.

Roger can help you determine the correct amount and type of insurance that you need to protect what you and your family have worked to build. From home and auto to life and disability, Roger will tailor fit a State Farm insurance program to meet your needs.

Roger can also help you meet your financial goals with investment and banking tools, including retirement accounts, mutual funds, CDs, and mortgages.

Helping individuals build and protect their dreams
